name: All Black And Blue
description:
A Simple Platformer

A fun first project to kick off my game development career!

All art designed by me!

Made in GDevelop! A great engine. I recommend it!

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Collect all the coins to win
  • Avoid spikes

Updates:

  • I plan on adding more levels and changing some of the mechanics.
  • Update 10/27/22: Added more to the existing level... Added polish to the start menu...
  • Update 10/27/22: Fixed a bug where you can't reach the 11th coin. added some extra stars...
